title: A Fashion Model With an Activist Streak
description: Yves Mathieu-East uses his body as a mural to tell his story of being a Black, queer model, activist and singer.
dc:creator: Alex Hawgood
media:credit: Chad Unger for The New York Times
media:description: Yves Mathieu-East has modeled for Pyer Moss, Thom Browne and Adidas. In his spare time, he volunteers with numerous charities and fosters pit bulls.
